horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: The first week of March presents notable planetary activity, with Venus moving into your sign, an important lunar eclipse in your sixth house, and Mercury's retrograde phase in your twelfth house. Venus's presence will boost your charm, making people more receptive to you. This period encourages new connections, potentially bringing individuals into your life for personal and business reasons. Over the next twenty-eight days, new job opportunities, business ideas, and even new relationships are possible. You may also feel motivated to refresh your appearance, perhaps with a new haircut or by updating your wardrobe.

On the third a powerful lunar eclipse will rise in the sixth house will bring significant changes into your sixth house of debts, diseases and enemies. A hidden issue at workplace will come into the light, so you will have to handle more responsibilities at work. An ongoing conflict at work may end, or a negative situation at work like job search will end, but it will take some time as the impact of the lunar eclipse will last for the next six months. A health issue also will get healed, but make sure you continue your diet and medication.

Mars will move into Pisces, and the Sun and Mercury are there, and Mercury is retrograding, so you will reconnect with someone from your past, either through a message or an unexpected encounter. There are chances for miscommunication in the private space, so make sure you don’t talk too much. It’s quite natural to have technical glitches, communication issues, and travel blocks, so this is not a favourable time to buy new electronic devices or long distance travel. You will go for spiritual practices, and therapy too.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: The first week of March will bring significant events due to the cosmic shift brought by Venus’s transit into your twelfth house, lunar eclipse in the fifth house, and Mercury retrogression in the eleventh house. Venus’s transit will bring some closure, introspection, and behind-the-scenes matters, so get ready for resolving some unfinished emotional or financial matters. You will have private conversations, and someone from the past will message you or appear in front of you. There will be some expenses related to comfort, travel, or personal healing, so you need to follow financial planning, otherwise the gains will be lesser than expenses. You will feel like being alone, focusing on your mental and physical health.

During the third, a powerful lunar eclipse will rise in the fifth house, so something related to children, creativity, romance and personal passion will reach a turning point. This eclipse will bring closure to a problem which you were facing regarding children like they completing a course, and you paying the full fees. Your love life also will be significant, and an ongoing issue will end , or some of you will go through breakup. If you are involved in speculative investments, or new ventures, you have to proceed carefully, as there are chances for losses.

Mercury is retrograding through Pisces, and Mars will move into Pisces during this week, so your eleventh house of friendships, and networks will be very important. There are chances for communication misunderstandings, so please think twice before you speak. There will be issues like technical glitches, and wrong business models, which is very normal during Mercury retrogression. You will meet with your old friends, or team mates, but make sure you don’t start any new ventures with them. There will be delay in collaborative efforts, but don’t try to forcefully execute it, as time will take its own course.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: The first week of March will witness three mega transits, they are Venus moving to Aries, lunar eclipse in Virgo, and Mars transit into Pisces. The week will start with Venus moving into your eleventh house, so your focus will shift towards your friendships, professional networks, and long-term aspirations. You will find supportive people who will help to refine your goals or introduce you to powerful contacts. This Venus will surely add more charm to your social interactions, and people will be very warm and welcoming. You will get new job opportunities or opportunities to join new clubs, or some teams which can be online or offline.

The lunar eclipse will occur in your fourth house will bring developments within home, family matters, and emotional foundations. A situation connected to property, relocation, or family issue will reach a turning point. You will do something for your home, which you always wanted to, like buying a device, or conducting a family function. The lunar eclipse will bring closures in a family issue, but you should stay away from any kind of family politics. The impact of the lunar eclipse will last for the next six months, so in the next six months, you will renovate, reorganise or have a real estate transaction.

Mars will move into Pisces, and Mercury is already retrograde here, so this will highlight your career path. Workplace communication will need extra care as Mercury retrograde can bring technical issues, communication problems and delay in the projects, which can be frustrating. Additionally, two fiery planets Mars and the Sun are also in the tenth house, so there are higher chances for arguments with your managers or fatherly figures. So, please be patient and careful at work, as any time disputes can arise. You must double check the documents, presentations, and timelines, otherwise there will be errors in your projects.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: Your career will be very important as Venus will move into Aries, which will bring an important career shift. You will experience a stronger desire to improve your professional image, especially for those who have own ventures, or work in media or politics. This is the closest time to get recognition and appreciation from your managers and clients, so present your ideas with diplomatic and grace. There will be a better work atmosphere, and you will be able solve many issues at work. New job opportunities can come up, so, this is a good time for job seekers, and new business contacts also will be coming up.

The lunar eclipse will activate your third house and it will bring important developments in communication, learning, travel and your siblings will have important events in their life. Some of the private conversations will be coming up and will reach a revealing point. You will find some projects are not useful, so you will quit them, or you will get some new projects which you were trying to get for a long time. There will be new learning programs, a lot of conversations happening online and offline. If you were planning a short trip, that will happen in the next six months.

The transit Mars will enter Pisces and Mercury is retrograding right there, so you can expect technical glitches, communication issues or travel blocks. If you were planning to write back papers, then you will get that opportunity this time, and there are higher chances for you to get through them. There will be travel blocks, and this is not the right time for long distance travels, as there will be delay in visa processing or your ticket may get cancelled. This is a good time for learning new things, but you have to give more effort to remember everything.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: The first week of March will have three major transits, they are Venus’s transit in Aries, lunar eclipse in Virgo and Mars transit in Pisces. The week will start with Venus moving into Aries, which will impact your ninth house of foreign travel, higher studies and spirituality. This transit will make you broaden your horizon, through travel, higher education, publishing, or spiritual exploration. You will get opportunities for foreign collaborations, and there will be long distance travel or projects like cultural exchange. You will get some benefit from legal or academic matters, and some of your articles also will get published.

The lunar eclipse will bring financial awareness and shifts in your self-worth, as it is occurring in the second house. The lunar eclipse indicates completions, and the impact of this eclipse will last for the next six months. A financial matter will reach a turning point, so you will reassess your spending, savings and income stability. There will be unexpected expenses, so prepare for that, and don’t entertain any one with instant money making plans near you. You will try to restructure your finances, as you will understand the need of budgeting, and careful spending. Job seekers will get the closest chances to get a new job in the next six months.

Martian transit to Pisces will bring complexities as Mercury is also retrograding in Pisces. Both the planets will bring further financial concerns and you are not supposed to make any big financial moves. There will be delays or revisions involving contracts, insurance, or joint accounts, so, you need to review them before you do anything. It is quite natural to have technical glitches, communication issues, and travel blocks during Mercury retrograde. There will be arguments with your partners in financial matters, so please keep an account of your financial transactions.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: For Virgo Sun, Moon or rising signs, the first week of March will encourage self-healing as Venus will move into the eighth house. You will focus on strengthening the trust and financial corporation, so use this time to build both. There will be some conversations about joint finances, investments, loans, or long-term security. This is a time to apply for a new insurance, tax or plans regarding PF. You will have a heart to heart conversation with your life partner, and this also a time to solve relationship issues despite personal or professional. You will get some financial support, but unexpected expenses also will be coming up.

The lunar eclipse will activate your personal life as it is occurring in your sign, and this indicates endings. The impact of the lunar eclipse will last for the next six months, so you will complete a project in the next six months. There will be visible change in your personality, and you will even go for a makeover. This eclipse will bring healing in health matters let it be emotional or physical. Health routines, appearance or life style habits will need attention, and you will do the best to refine yourself.

Meanwhile Mercury retrograde in the seventh house, and Mars transit into the same house will influence partnerships, contracts, close collaborations. There are chances for misunderstandings with your partners, spouse or business partner. It is normal to have technical glitches, communication issues and travel blocks during Mercury retrogression. Former partners or associates may reappear during Mercury retrograde. This is not the time to start a new project or a business venture, so make sure you postpone such plans until Mercury move direct. Delays in signing contracts, or in getting offer letters will be there, but you have to be patient.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: The first week of March will bring many surprises for you for the next few days, as your ruler Venus will be in the seventh house of relationships. Libran Sun, Moon and rising sign natives will focus on the relationship, and the main idea is to improve the relationship. Single natives will have the closest opportunities to find someone special, but you should not be in a hurry for that. Negotiations and agreements will move forward, but you should cross check the documents, as Mercury is in retrogression. You will go for social gatherings, birth day parties or business meets too.

The lunar eclipse will rise in the twelfth house of isolation and detachment, so you will be feeling a bit isolated amid the crowd. The impact of the eclipse will last for the next six months, so you will have to be careful with your emotional self. You may go through some confusion because you may find it difficult to set your priorities. This is the time to take rest, reflect and restore your spiritual grounding, then you will maintain the balance. There is nothing wrong in stepping back for a while than reacting immediately to emotional triggers. You will also get some updates from the foreign lands.

The transit Mars will enter Pisces, and Mercury is also retrograde, and it will impact the sixth house of work, diseases and struggles. Due to Mercury retrogression, miscommunication at work place can come up if instructions are not clearly defined. Please don’t take any responsibilities which are unknown to you, otherwise there will be a lot of complexities. You must double check emails, appointments, and task details to prevent errors. During this time, you will take up new health care practices, and restructure your workout routines too. You will also meet your ex-colleagues, and avoid any personal talk at work.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: For Scorpio Sun, Moon and rising signs, this is a special week, as Venus, the planet for diplomacy will move into the sixth house. This transit will shift your focus on your workplace and health related matters, and these both areas will be very crucial for the next twenty days. Venus will bring some solutions for the workplace issues, and it will surely soften the relationship with your colleagues. There will be new projects, and your work quality also will increase. However, your health may a bit fluctuate, so the diet will be very important, and you must avoid junk.

The lunar eclipse will rise in the eleventh house, so there will be some completions in the long-term projects, so, get ready to start some projects in the next six months. You will find who is your friend and who is the foe, and which social connections are aligning with your ambitions. A group project or community involvement will reach a turning point, and you will make an announcement regarding that completion. This eclipse will also bring some significant events in your sibling’s life. The impact of the eclipse will last for the next six months, so you will refine your long-term objectives in this time frame.

Meanwhile Mercury is retrograding in your fifth house, and Mars will move into the fifth house, so this will influence your children, creativity and speculative ventures. Mercury retrogression will bring communication issues, technical glitches, and travel blocks, so you have to be careful with your communication. A past love interest will reappear, but don’t take any impulsive decision, like taking them back out of your emotional spur. You will be working in some creative projects, but make sure you have the right analysis, otherwise there are chances for potential losses. You will also attend social gatherings, and spend more time with your children, as they will have important projects which will be complex in nature.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: For Sagittarius Sun, Moon and rising signs, the first week of March will highlight creativity, career visibility and family matters as Venus will be moving through the fifth house, the lunar eclipse will occur in the tenth house, and Mercury will influence the fourth house. Venus transit to Aries is very good for studies and your creative pursuits, as the fifth house indicates both. If you want to start studying something, the universe will bring such opportunities, so be alert not to miss them. You will spend time in creative pursuits, but kindly avoid spending huge for business based on speculation. Single Sagittarius natives will find someone special and get attracted to them, and there are chances to attend social gatherings for entertainment purposes.

The lunar eclipse will impact the tenth house of career, so there will be some significant changes at work in the next six months. A professional matter will reach a turning point, and that will make you to reassess your ambitions and long term career goals. This is a complex phase, as the lunar eclipse is not a great energy as the Moon indicates emotions, so you have to control your fears about your professional life. You will gain clarity about your career path, you will also get some recognition about your past efforts, and you will understand where you need to adjust. Please make sure you keep a good vibe with your managers.

Mercury is retrograding in Pisces, and that will impact the fourth house, and Mars also will enter Pisces during this week. Misunderstandings within the house can disturb the domestic peace, so you should avoid any confrontations at home. There will be delays connected to housing arrangements, repairs, or documentation, so you should be patient, as Mercury retrogression is not ideal for all these. However, this is a good time renovation, relocation or review the contracts.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: For Capricorn Sun, Moon and rising sign natives the first week of March will witness important events at home, as Venus will be moving into the fourth house. Venus indicates beauty and harmony, so you will try to beautify your house by taking up renovation project or you will buy some objects online. This is a good time to solve the family disputes, and you will take an important role in solving these issues. You will also take part in family gatherings, or you will meet some of your friends or they will visit you. This Venus will aspect the tenth house, so there will be improvement at workplace.

The lunar eclipse will take place in the ninth house, and that will impact your long distance travel and studies. A situation connected to higher studies, publishing or foreign collaboration will reach a turning point. You will try to go to a place you always wanted to go, and that can happen in the next six months, as the impact of this eclipse will last that long. This eclipse will bring productive conversations with your mentors and teachers, and they will give you the right inputs. You will also spend more time in reading spiritual matters or go for pilgrimages.

Meanwhile Mercury is retrograding in Pisces, which will impact your third house, so there will be some blockages in short travels. Mercury retrogression is known for technical glitches, communication problems, and travel blocks, so you must take care of these. You must double check emails, agreements, and travel details, as there are chances for errors. You will revisit your friends, siblings and close relatives during this time, but there will be some arguments as well. The neck to hand area will be very sensitive, so you will have to take care of that as well.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: For Aquarius, Sun, Moon and rising natives, the first week of Mars will activate their third house due to the Venus transit. You will have better communication with the people around you and Venus will be in Aries for the next twenty plus days. This Venus will support you in solving minor misunderstandings, and you will also spend time in networking and thus creating new contacts. There will be shirt trips, online and offline meetings, which will bring pleasant outcomes. You will also spend time in writing, learning new skills, and publishing your work. Definitely, this transit is going to make you busier for the next twenty plus days.

The lunar eclipse will rise in your eighth house, and that will bring important events connected to shared finances, investments, taxes, loans and emotional issues. The lunar eclipse is a kind of full moon, and it indicates endings, so a joint finance related matter will reach a turning point. That will prompt you to reassess responsibilities, and long term security. There will be discussions regarding tax, PF and insurance, but you have to review that documentation with the support of an expert. There will be sudden expenses, and you have to be prepared for that.

Mars will move into Pisces, and Mercury is retrograding right here, so again the financial matters will be gaining importance. Mars itself is the planet for financial liability, so for every Aquarius Sun, Moon and rising natives, the money matters will be of high alert. You should control the expenses, as the gains will be lesser compared to the expenses. This is not the time to start a new investment plan, as Mercury retrogression will bring confusion, technical glitches and communication problems. However, this is a good time to update your skills, so that you can get a new offer or promotion when Mercury moves direct.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting March 1
content: For Pisces Sun, Moon and rising signs natives the first transit of March will be Venus’s transit to Aries which will impact the second house. This transit will make you focused on the financial matters, so you will try to improve your finances. Venus is a natural benefic, so you will get some money, at the same time Venus is also the planet for opulence, so you have to control that, otherwise you will have less gains. This is a good week for job seekers as there are many chances for them to get a new job, upskill or to get appraisals as well.

The lunar eclipse will rise in the seventh house so this will bring endings, especially in the business partnerships. The impact of the lunar eclipse will last for the next six months, so in the next six months, you will discontinue a relationship from personal or business domain, so that you can start a new one. If you are in a business partnership, contractual terms need a careful assessment, otherwise you will misunderstand them. You will also attend social gatherings for personal and business purpose, but you should not overshare anything with strangers. New partnership opportunities will come up, but you should not be in a hurry to start them.

Mercury is retrograding in your sign, and Mars will also move into Pisces, so your personal life will be very important. Mercury retrogression will bring communication issues, technical glitches, and travel blocks, so you will have to be careful with whatever you do. You will meet people from the past, but make sure you don’t have blind trust on them, as the chances for them to stay back for long is less. This is a good time to take care of your physical and mental health through self-review, before you take a bold action.
